name: Connection
description:
"I'm looking at what Jack was talking about 
and it's definitely not a particle that's nearby 

It is a bright object 
and it's obviously rotating because it's flashing, 
it's way out in the distance, 
certainly rotating in a very rhythmic fashion 
because the flashes come around almost on time

As we look back at the earth 
it's up at about 11 o'clock, 
about maybe ten or twelve diameters

I don't know whether that does you any good, 
but there's something out there."


*

Abstract light painting created with steel wool on fire in pitch darkness. It was complemented by digital art.


This piece is part of a colorful series of mine (Revival, 2017). 

-

Longa exposição abstrata, pintada com lã de aço em chamas, feita no completo escuro. Terminei de finalizá-la através da arte digital.

Esta arte é parte de um projeto colorido meu (Revival, 2017).

*

Original artwork by @carolinabragaferreira/@artcarolinabf


Brazil, 2021
